com.smartgov.lez.core.agent.establishment

Class Establishment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartgov.lez.core.agent.establishment.Establishment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    smartgov.core.agent.moving.ParkingArea

    public class Establishment
extends java.lang.Object
implements smartgov.core.agent.moving.ParkingArea
    Represents establishments that can receive and perform deliveries.

    This class implements the ParkingArea interface, to represent the fact that vehicle are waiting outside of the road graph between each delivery.

      • addVehicleToFleet

        public void addVehicleToFleet(DeliveryVehicle vehicle)
        Adds a vehicle to the establishment's fleet.

        Vehicles are indexed by their internal DeliveryVehicle ids.

        In the current context, the vehicle's id does not have to be unique in the complete simulation, and only need to be unique by establishment, and so does the EstablishmentLoader.

        Parameters:
        vehicle - vehicle to add to the fleet

      • addRound

        public void addRound(DeliveryVehicle vehicle,
                     Round round)
        Adds a round to be performed by the specified vehicle.

        Rounds are indexed by vehicle ids.

        Parameters:
        vehicle - vehicle that can perform this round
        round - round to perform

      • getFleet

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DeliveryVehicle> getFleet()
        Returns the establishment vehicles, indexed by their ids.
        Returns:
        estalishment's fleet

      • getFleetByCapacity

        public java.util.Map<VehicleCapacity,java.util.Collection<DeliveryVehicle>> getFleetByCapacity()
        Returns a convenient fleet representation, indexed by vehicles capacities.

        Can be used to easily associate vehicles to rounds according to their respective capacities and weight for example.

        Returns:
        fleet representation, indexed by vehicle capacities

      • getRounds

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Round> getRounds()
        Returns rounds that must be performed by this establishment, indexed by delivery vehicle ids that must perform each round.
        Returns:
        establishment's rounds

      • addAgent

        public void addAgent(DeliveryDriverAgent agent)
        Adds an agent to the establishment.

        Such agents are not direcly used by the establishments, but represents a nice way to monitor agents and establishments behavior when agents added are agents corresponding to DeliveryDriverBodies that perform establishment's rounds (as it's done currently).

        Parameters:
        agent - agent to add to this establishment

      • getAgents

        public java.util.Collection<DeliveryDriverAgent> getAgents()
        Returns agents belonging to this establishment.

        Currently, corresponds to agents associated to the delivery drivers that performs establishment's rounds.

        Returns:
        establishment's agents

      • enter
